answers.answer: It's normal for morning sickness to happen around the first trimester & should fade away around 4 month but it can happen at anytime during your pregnancy depending on your body & hormones some last throughout the pregnancy mines is off & on.  I'm 18weeks 1 day with baby #3
It can, yes, but it also can be a sign of preeclampsia.  Just make sure you let your doctor know and that they measure your blood pressure.

question: Can morning sickness come on wen eva i am 19 wks??
title: morning sickness
